articles.title: Thomasin McKenzie charms Americans on Stephen Colbert's The Late Show - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The Kiwi actor joked about the excitement of being able to visit Target, and asked Colbert why he didn’t visit her during his last trip to Wellington.
articles.content:
Making her talk-show debut on Stephen Colberts The Late Show, Wellington actor Thomasin McKenzie kept it real.
 She joked about the exotic offerings of the US, mainly megastore Target, and questione… [+2995 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: FDA paves way for Pfizer COVID-19 vaccinations in young kids - KWCH
articles.description: The FDA cleared kid-size doses — just a third of the amount given to teens and adults — for emergency use, and up to 28 million more American children could be eligible for vaccinations as early as next week.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The Food and Drug Administration on Friday paved the way for children ages 5 to 11 to get Pfizers COVID-19 vaccine.
The FDA cleared kid-size doses just a third of the amount given to… [+5208 chars]

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: Joe Biden and Pope Francis talk for 90 minutes in a symbolic meeting for America's second Catholic president - 9News
articles.description: America's second Catholic president took part in an initial one-on-one meeting with Francis, which lasted 90 minutes, before participating in an expanded bilateral meeting ahead of the G20 Summit
